content: hi ravelers here s an update to an apple a day in dk this version simplifies some instructions and incorporates more industry-standard terminology and is still available as a free ravelry download the gauge has been revised to 21 sts per inch which makes the circumference slightly larger this pattern is a basic baby/child hat knitted in the round with a bit of i-cord for the stem and an attached leaf it knits up quickly and uses approximately 85 - 150 yards of red for the apple a scrap of brown for the stem and a a scrap of green for the leaf suggested yarn fiber is superwash wool or acrylic for ease of care when laundering 16 circular needles and 5 dpns in us 6 - 4 0 mm were used when designing this pattern it can be knit completely on dpns gauge 21 stitches 30 row = 4 in stockinette st in the round gauge is approximate
